amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt from the bill all regulations issued by the Food and Drug Administration relating to consumer safety, including those issued pursuant to the FDA Food Safety Modernization Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 172 - 248 (Roll no. 66).

action.text: Amendment (A005) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
